title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Real property boundary determination, aerial and digital mapping, Geodesy and geodetic surveying, GPS, Basics of photgrammetry. Introduction to remote sensing: sensors, present status of remote sensing satellites, Digital image processing techniques; introduction to digital terrain modelling; Environmental resource mapping, Geomatics application programming. Introduction to Land and Geographic Information Systems; Different coordinate system, working principle of GIS, Database associated with GIS, Applications of GIS in surface mining, Applications of GIS in land development, road construction, etc,. Hands on exercise on Image processing and GIS packages
